1.title: T.H.E. Cat.

2.heading: Dell Publishing Co.
2.title: Taking Care of Terrific
2.author: Lois Lowry.
notes: Summary (by Anne Tracy): Taking her overprotected young charge (named for the CBS cartoon feature Tom Terrific) to the public park to broaden his horizons, fourteen-year-old baby sitter Enid enjoys unexpected friendships with a black saxophonist and a bag lady until she is charged with kidnapping.
